mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_words(text):
    words = re.findall('', text.lower())
    consonant_words = [word for word in words if re.match('\\b\\w*[bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz]\\b', word)]
    frequency = Counter(consonant_words)
    return dict(frequency)

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_words(text):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text.lower())
    consonant_words = [word for word in words if re.match('', word)]
    frequency = Counter(consonant_words)
    return dict(frequency)
